评论详情: Fit super weird. I'm a standard size 0-2 and these were too baggy in the front, too tight in the back and SO long. The interior ankle slit also comes up to a weird hight.

评论概述: Jeans with slits up the sides
评论详情: I like that they are very different from what I would normally get for myself. Runs a little small but determined to fit into them soon.
I so badly wanted these to work for me. It felt like true denim and good quality. Unfortunately, I tried my true size, one below and one above and none seemed quite right.

I ordered these jeans in my size and had to return them unfortunately. They are good quality and have a super cute style, but because they’re 100% cotton, didn’t fit to my shape. would recommend if you can fit 100% cotton jeans!

I really love BLANKNYC jeans! I would say this brand run a bit big. I typically wear a 26/27 in jeans and for this style I had to get the 25. But that could be because it sits at your true natural waist. They are SUPER long and could be hemmed but then you’d lose the split hem. I’m 5’4” and they fit perfect when I wear 4” heels (which is how I plan to wear them) but just a word of caution. (Ignore my scrunched toes LOL)  I really love how high they go without giving you the dreaded “mom butt”. The split hem is so chic. I’m obsessed. Can’t wait to wear them out!

评论概述: My Mom Never Looked This Good
评论详情: Mom jeans are definitely in nowadays. These a perfect fit and super cute. I think they look better with a heel because the ankle is a little tapered/boot cut. I am 5'2 and I have to stand on my tippy toes for that perfect flawless look.

评论概述: Do NOT hold their shape at all; very baggy after having them on for a bit.  Very disappointed : (

Like Jeans should be. Love the straight leg.  They are true to size
The first pair of jeans in years that actually come up to my natural waist and long enough too.  Pretty heavy duty denim. Hoping they don't  shrink when washed and dried.
